name: SkinGuide MCP
description: Search skincare products by Baumann skin type, product category, and budget. Find the perfect products for your skin type among 16 different skin type profiles.

tools.name: search_products
tools.description: Search skincare products based on skin type characteristics, product type, country, and budget. Returns products with name, brand, price, and compatible skin types.

country.description: Country for product availability: 'US' or 'UAE'. Defaults to 'US'.

od.description: Skin oiliness: 'O' for Oily, 'D' for Dry

sr.description: Skin sensitivity: 'S' for Sensitive, 'R' for Resistant

pn.description: Skin pigmentation: 'P' for Pigmented (prone to dark spots), 'N' for Non-pigmented

wt.description: Skin aging: 'W' for Wrinkled (shows aging), 'T' for Tight (firm)

budget.description: Maximum price in dollars. Use 5, 10, 20, 50, or 100. Use 101 for products over $100.

limit.description: Maximum number of products to return. Defaults to 50.

tools.name: get_skin_type_info
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific Baumann skin type (e.g., ORPW, DSNT). Returns the full name, description, and characteristics.

tools.name: list_skin_types
tools.description: List all 16 Baumann skin types with their names and brief descriptions. Useful for understanding the skin type classification system.

tools.name: get_product_types
tools.description: Get a list of all available product categories in the SkinGuide database.
